"I am" <lb n="c56-0097__main__3"/>said she "the cousin of the unhappy <lb n="c56-0097__main__4"/>child who was murdered or rather his <lb n="c56-0097__main__5"/>sister for I was educated <add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">by</add> and lived <lb n="c56-0097__main__6"/>with his parents <del rend="strikethrough">s</del> ever <del rend="strikethrough">sin</del> since and <lb n="c56-0097__main__7"/>long before his birth; it may therefore <lb n="c56-0097__main__8"/>be judged indecent in me to come <lb n="c56-0097__main__9"/>forward on this occasion but when <lb n="c56-0097__main__10"/>I see a fellow creature about to perish <lb n="c56-0097__main__11"/>through the cowardice of her pretended <lb n="c56-0097__main__12"/>friends I wish to <add place="superlinear">be</add> allowed

speak that <lb n="c56-0097__main__13"/>I may say what I know of her character. <lb n="c56-0097__main__14"/><del rend="strikethrough">and</del> I <del rend="strikethrough">know a great deal</del><add place="sublinear"><metamark function="insert">^</metamark></add><add place="superlinear">am well acquainted with it.</add><del rend="strikethrough">for</del> I have <lb n="c56-0097__main__15"/>lived in

same house with her at <lb n="c56-0097__main__16"/>one time for five and afterwards for <lb n="c56-0097__main__17"/>nearly two years.
